snippet: Former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi’s attempt to resuscitate his endangered political career by bringing down the government instead provoked a rebellion in his own party.
abstract: Former Italian Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi’s attempt to resuscitate his endangered political career by bringing down government has instead provoked rebellion in his own party; government survives confidence vote with unexpected ease, with moderates surprisingly promising deep reforms and scoring an unusually decisive victory in the most unstable of the euro zone's big economies.

byline.contributor: Elisabetta Povoledo and Lucia Magi contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi’s attempt to resuscitate his endangered political career by bringing down the government instead provoked a rebellion in his own party.

headline.main: Mutiny Halts Italian Gambit by Berlusconi
headline.print_headline: Mutiny Halts Italian Gambit By Berlusconi
